title: Created contacts do not immediately display the Name on incoming calls
blurb: The contact display now updates instantly on incoming calls, ensuring users see caller information without delay.

title: Flickering on user caller ID
blurb: The caller ID flickering issue has been resolved, providing a clearer and more stable caller identification experience.

title: Internal Contact Details Not Updating on Mobile
blurb: Internal contact details now update correctly on mobile devices, ensuring users always see the latest contact information.

title: Implement reactive internal and external contact update handling
blurb: The contact update system now reacts instantly to changes, keeping contact information current across the platform.

title: Display sending status for internal conversations
blurb: Users can now see real-time sending status in internal chats, enhancing communication transparency.

title: Audio button incorrectly pre-selected on call initiation
blurb: The audio button now defaults correctly during call start, preventing user confusion and streamlining call setup.

title: System messages unarchive group conversations
blurb: Group conversations now unarchive properly when system messages are received, improving message management.

title: [Messaging API] Cap conversations limit fetch to 100
blurb: The messaging API now limits conversation fetches to 100, optimizing performance and data handling.

title: Updated contact name not reflected in message info panel
blurb: Updated contact names now appear correctly in message info panels, ensuring accurate communication details.

title: Message input unblocks for adhoc groups, allowing SMS without 10DLC campaign registration
blurb: Message input is now unblocked for ad hoc groups, enabling SMS sending without requiring 10DLC campaign registration.

title: Audio and video Source/Device are not displayed correctly (Chrome & Firefox)
blurb: Audio and video source and device displays are now accurate across Chrome and Firefox browsers, improving media setup.

title: Implement optimistic message sending with status display in internal chats
blurb: Messages now send optimistically with real-time status updates, enhancing chat responsiveness and user confidence.

title: Empty state for new chats via search bar
blurb: An empty state view now appears for new chats initiated through search, guiding users smoothly into conversations.

title: Contact Duplicates 2nd Phase
blurb: Duplicate contact management has been enhanced, reducing clutter and improving contact accuracy.

title: Adjust incoming call notification when the user is on a call
blurb: Incoming call notifications are now better adjusted when users are already on a call, minimizing disruptions.

title: [Video] Implement Noise Cancellation (Krisp)
blurb: Noise cancellation using Krisp is now integrated into video calls, improving audio clarity for users.

title: [Video] Bugsnag integration
blurb: Bugsnag error monitoring has been integrated into video features, enabling proactive issue detection and resolution.

title: Limit Conversation Polling to 30
blurb: Conversation polling frequency has been limited to 30 seconds, balancing real-time updates with system performance.
